column19:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • If you are looking for a functional yet stylish backpack then Cabarelli is the answer to your prayers. The bulky backpack is given a sleek compact look with smart designs. And the multiple compartments prove to be a boon to help organise better.

  • Product Details
  • Brown backpack with yellow accents
